sentence: The image is a promotional poster for "The Brady Bunch Movie."
sentence_cn: 图片是《脱线家族》电影的宣传海报。

sentence: It features the cast standing on a wooden staircase.
sentence_cn: 画面中演员们站在木楼梯上。

sentence: The staircase is oddly positioned between two halves of a globe that are split apart.
sentence_cn: 楼梯奇怪地位于分开的两半球体之间。

sentence: The background shows a hole in the globe where the staircase is inserted.
sentence_cn: 背景显示了地球仪上插入楼梯的一个洞。

sentence: The cast is lined up along the staircase, showcasing a variety of bright, retro outfits reminiscent of the 1970s.
sentence_cn: 演员们沿着楼梯排成一排，展示了各种令人回想起 20 世纪 70 年代的明亮复古服装。

sentence: Above them, the text reads, "They're Back To Save America From The '90s."
sentence_cn: 他们上方的文字写着：“他们回来拯救美国，摆脱 90 年代的困境。”
words: They're Back To Save America From The '90s.

sentence: Below the staircase, at the bottom of the poster, is the title "The Brady Bunch Movie" in colorful, playful lettering.
sentence_cn: 楼梯下方，海报底部，用色彩鲜艳、俏皮的字体写着“脱线家族电影”。

sentence: The poster's design suggests a humorous, nostalgic theme, contrasting the style and norms of the 1970s with those of the 1990s.
sentence_cn: 海报的设计传达了一种幽默、怀旧的主题，将 20 世纪 70 年代的风格和规范与 20 世纪 90 年代的风格和规范进行了对比。

sentence: There is also fine print at the bottom with credits and an MPAA rating of PG-13.
sentence_cn: 底部还有细则，注明了片尾字幕和 MPAA PG-13 评级。
